text: Po milosti Allakha ty byl myagok po otnosheniyu k nim. A ved' yesli by ty byl grubym i zhestokoserdnym, to oni nepremenno pokinuli by tebya. Prosti zhe ikh, poprosi dlya nikh proshcheniya i sovetuysya s nimi o delakh. Kogda zhe ty primesh' resheniye, to upovay na Allakha, ved' Allakh lyubit upovayushchikh
